nodes.text: Salus Bralor was a male Human Mandalorian of Clan Bralor who was the father of Jogo. After learning that his son was killed by the Grand Champion, he went to Taris to confront him. He challenged the hunter to a blood duel, but was killed in the duel by the champion and Torian Cadera. He wore brown and gold Mandalorian armor
Salus Bralor will only fight you above Taris if you killed his son, Jogo.
